titleStmt.title: Italy in its original glory, ruine, and revival being an exact survey of the whole geography and history of that famous country, with the adjacent islands of Sicily, Malta, &c. : and whatever is remarkable in Rome (the mistress of the world) and all those towns and territories mentioned in antient and modern authors / translated out of the originals for general satisfaction, by Edmund Warcupp, Esquire.

Italy in its original glory, ruine, and revival being an exact survey of the whole geography and history of that famous country, with the adjacent islands of Sicily, Malta, &c. : and whatever is remarkable in Rome (the mistress of the world) and all those towns and territories mentioned in antient and modern authors / translated out of the originals for general satisfaction, by Edmund Warcupp, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Schottus, Franciscus, 1548-1622.
Warcupp, Edmund.

biblFull.extent: [18], 327, [1] p., 2 folded leaves of plates : ill., map

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Griffin for H. Twyford, Tho. Dring and I. Place ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of Schottus's Itinerarii Italiae rerumque Romarum libri tres (Antwerp, 1660) and the Itinerario (Padua, 1629). Cf. NCBEL.
First ed. in English. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
